metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Python can be used in database applications.
content.html: Python can be used in database applications.

content.text: One of the most popular NoSQL database is MongoDB.
content.html: One of the most popular NoSQL database is MongoDB.

content.text: MongoDB stores data in JSON-like documents, which makes the database very flexible and scalable.
content.html: MongoDB stores data in JSON-like documents, which makes the database very flexible and scalable.

content.text: To be able to experiment with the code examples in this tutorial, you will need access to a MongoDB database.
content.html: To be able to experiment with the code examples in this tutorial, you will need access to a MongoDB database.

content.text: You can download a free MongoDB database at https://www.mongodb.com .
content.html: You can download a free MongoDB database at https://www.mongodb.com.

content.text: Or get started right away with a MongoDB cloud service at https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas .
content.html: Or get started right away with a MongoDB cloud service at https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas.

content.text: Python needs a MongoDB driver to access the MongoDB database.
content.html: Python needs a MongoDB driver to access the MongoDB database.

content.text: In this tutorial we will use the MongoDB driver "PyMongo".
content.html: In this tutorial we will use the MongoDB driver "PyMongo".

content.text: We recommend that you use PIP to install "PyMongo".
content.html: We recommend that you use PIP to install "PyMongo".

content.text: PIP is most likely already installed in your Python environment.
content.html: PIP is most likely already installed in your Python environment.

content.text: Navigate your command line to the location of PIP, and type the following:
content.html: Navigate your command line to the location of PIP, and type the following:

content.code_html: C:\Users\Your Name\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python36-32\Scripts>python -m pip install pymongo

content.text: Now you have downloaded and installed a mongoDB driver.
content.html: Now you have downloaded and installed a mongoDB driver.

content.text: To test if the installation was successful, or if you already have "pymongo" installed, create a Python page with the following content:
content.html: To test if the installation was successful, or if you already have "pymongo" installed, create a Python page with the following content:

content.code_html: import pymongo

content.text: If the above code was executed with no errors, "pymongo" is installed and ready to be used.
content.html: If the above code was executed with no errors, "pymongo" is installed and ready to be used.
